Name: Bruschetta (Vegetarian)
Description: Toasted baguette slice with tomato, garlic, and olive oil
Preparation: Slice baguette diagonally (1/2 inch thick). Brush with olive oil. Toast bread in oven (broil) or pan (medium heat) until golden brown and crisp. Dice tomatoes (optional: remove seeds/pulp). Mince garlic. Rub warm bread with garlic. Top with tomatoes, salt, and olive oil.

Name: Caprese Skewers
Description: Cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and fresh basil leaves with balsamic glaze (optional)
Preparation: Thread cherry tomatoes, mozzarella balls, and fresh basil leaves onto skewers. Drizzle with balsamic glaze (optional).

Name: Edamame (Vegan)
Description: Steamed or boiled edamame with sea salt
Preparation: Steam or boil frozen shelled edamame according to package instructions. Drain and sprinkle with sea salt.

Name: Hummus and Pita Bread (Vegetarian)
Description: Hummus with whole wheat pita bread
Preparation: Serve store-bought hummus with whole wheat pita bread for dipping.

Name: Greek Yogurt with Berries
Description: Plain Greek yogurt with mixed berries
Preparation: Layer plain Greek yogurt with mixed berries in a bowl.

Name: Baked Apples
Description: Baked apples with chopped nuts, honey, and cinnamon
Preparation: Core apples. Stuff with chopped nuts, honey, and cinnamon. Bake until tender (around 30 minutes at 375F / 190C)

Name: Dark Chocolate with Almonds (Vegan)
Description: Dark chocolate (70% cacao or higher) with almonds
Preparation: Enjoy dark chocolate (70% cacao or higher) with almonds.
Ingredient1: 1 oz dark chocolate (70% cacao or higher)

Name: Fruit Salad
Description: Mixed fruits with lemon juice and honey (optional)
Preparation: Wash & chop desired fruits, toss together with lemon juice & honey (optional).

Name: Salmon with Roasted Vegetables
Description: Baked salmon fillet with roasted broccoli and cherry tomatoes
Preparation: Preheat oven to 400F (200C). Season salmon fillet with salt and pepper. Toss desired vegetables (broccoli, cherry tomatoes, etc.) with olive oil and salt. Arrange salmon and vegetables on a baking sheet. Roast for 15-20 minutes, or until salmon is cooked through and  egetables are tender-crisp.

Name: One-Pan Chicken Fajitas
Description: Sliced chicken breast, bell pepper, and onion fajitas cooked in a pan with fajita seasoning, served on tortillas
Preparation: Slice chicken breast, season with fajita seasoning & olive oil, slice bell pepper & onion, heat skillet over medium-high heat, cook chicken until browned, push chicken to side & add vegetables, cook until tender-crisp, serve with tortillas & toppings.

Name: Lentil Soup (Vegetarian)
Description: Lentils simmered in vegetable broth with vegetables and herbs
Preparation: Rinse lentils. In a pot, combine lentils, vegetable broth, chopped vegetables (onion, carrots, celery), and dried thyme. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste

Name: Black Bean Burgers (Vegan)
Description: Black bean burgers made with oats, vegetables, and spices, served on hamburger buns
Preparation: Rinse & drain black beans, mash half, combine with remaining whole beans, rolled oats, chopped onion & bell pepper, olive oil, cumin, salt & pepper, form into patties, cook in skillet 3-4 min per side or until golden brown & heated through, serve on buns with toppings.

Name: Sage-Rubbed Salmon
Preparation: In a large cast-iron skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add salmon, skin side down; cook 5 minutes. Transfer skillet to oven; bake just until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes.

Name: Shrimp Spaghetti with Cherry Tomatoes
Preparation: Cook until tomatoes begin to burst, 4-5 minutes. Add shrimp; cook until shrimp turn pink, 4-5 minutes. Add pasta, reserved pasta water and Romano to pan; stir until creamy. Garnish with parsley and additional Romano.
Ingredient8: 3/4 cup muffuletta mix or olive bruschetta topping

Name: Air-Fryer Popcorn Shrimp
Description: These quick air-fryer shrimp are so good you won't even miss the fat! Eat them alone with cocktail sauce or put them on a salad or sandwich
Preparation: Preheat air fryer. In a shallow bowl, whisk egg, milk and hot pepper sauce, Place bread crumbs in a  bowl. Dip shrimp in flour to coat both sides; Dip in egg mixture, then in bread crumbs, patting to help adhere. In batches, arrange shrimp in a single layer in greased air fryer;  Cook until 3-4 minutes on each side.
Ingredient9: 1 pound uncooked shrimp (26-30 per pound), peeled and deveined
Ingredient10: Seafood cocktail sauce and lemon wedges

Name: First-Place Coconut Macaroons
Description: These coconut macaroon cookies earned me a first-place ribbon at the county fair.

Name: Cranberry Biscotti
Description: This cranberry biscotti is the perfect hostess gift for the holidays.
Preparation: Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla. add flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt;  Stir in ground almonds and cranberries. Shape and Bake until lightly browned, about 25 minutes. Cut diagonally into 1/2-in. slices. Bake until lightly browned, 8-10 minutes per side

Name: Lemon Crisp Cookies
Description: They take only 10 minutes to whip up! The sunny yellow color, big lemon flavor and delightful crunch
Preparation: Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients (dough will be crumbly). Shape into 1-in. balls. Place 2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets.Bake 10-12 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute; remove from pan to a wire rack to cool completely.
Ingredient4: 1 large egg, room temperature, lightly beaten

Name: Fantastic Fruit Smoothie
Description: For a thick smoothie, use frozen fruit.
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in blender and process until very smooth and creamy. Serve immediately.
Ingredient1: 1 frozen or fresh banana, broken into chunks
Ingredient2: 1 1/2 cups  unsweetened fruit juice, any kind
Ingredient3: 1/2 cups liced fresh or frozen unsweetened fruit or berries
Ingredient4: 1/2 cups plain, vanilla, or fruit-flavored soy yogurt

Name: Pineapple-Citrus Green Smoothie
Description: Start your day off strong with a green smoothie!
Preparation: Combine the spinach, pineapple, cucumber, lemon, banana, and water in a blender, along with any optional add-ins. Puree until very smooth, adding more water as needed to puree. Taste, and if you’d like it sweeter, add sweetener of choice. Reserve extra ingredients for future use.
Ingredient1: 2 cups baby spinach, loosely packed, see note
Ingredient2: 1 1/2 cups frozen pineapple cubes or chunks
Ingredient4: 1 large lemon or small orange, peeled
Ingredient5: 1 cup overripe banana, frozen or fresh, sliced
Ingredient6: 1 1/4 cups  or more to thin as desired water
Ingredient7: 2 tbsp (30 mL) vanilla plant-based protein powder
Ingredient8: 2 tbsp (30 mL) vanilla plant-based protein powder
Ingredient9: 2 tsp (10 mL) pure maple syrup or a pinch of stevia, to sweeten, if desired, see banana note

Name: Pumpkin Smoothie
Preparation: Combine all ingredients in blender. Blend for 1 to 2 minutes until everything is incorporated. Adjust amounts as needed.
Ingredient4: 2 tbsp (30 mL) maple syrup, or to taste
Ingredient5: 3 tsp (15 mL) vanilla extract, or to taste
Ingredient6: 3 tsp (15 mL) pumpkin pie spice, or use a combination of cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice
Ingredient7: or use a combination of cinnamon, nutmeg, and allspice

Name: Ginger shots
Preparation: Chop the ginger into small chunks. Tip into a blender with the apple and lemon juice and blitz for a few minutes until very smooth.

Name: Chicken satay salad
Preparation: Curry powder, cumin, garlic and honey Mix with Slice the chicken breasts in half add to the marinade and mix well to coat. Set aside 1 hr. Mix the peanut butter with the chilli sauce, lime juice, and 1 tbsp . Cook for 5-6 mins. Slice the chicken, pile on top and sauce.
Ingredient2: 1 tsp medium curry powder, ¼ tsp ground cumin,
Ingredient5: 2 skinless chicken breast fillets (or use turkey breast)
Ingredient7: 1 tbsp sweet chilli sauce, 1 tbsp lime juice
Ingredient8: sunflower oil, for wiping the pan
Ingredient9: 2 Little Gem lettuce hearts, cut into wedges

Name: 10-minute couscous salad
Preparation: Couscous into a large bowl add hot water, cover, then leave for 10 mins. Slice the onions and pepper, and dice the cucumber. Add these to the couscous, crumble in the feta, then sprinkle over pine nuts to serve.
Ingredient2: 200ml hot low salt vegetable stock (from a cube is fine)

Name: Greek salad
Preparation: Place 4 large vine tomatoes, cut into wedges, 1 peeled, deseeded and chopped cucumber, ½ a thinly sliced red onion, 16 Kalamata olives, 1 tsp dried oregano, 85g feta cheese chunks and 4 tbsp Greek extra virgin olive oil in a large bowl.
Ingredient1: 4 large vine tomatoes, cut into irregular wedges
Ingredient2: 1 cucumber, peeled, deseeded, then roughly chopped
Ingredient3: ½ a red onion thinly sliced
Ingredient6: 85g feta cheese, cut into chunks (barrel matured feta is the best)
Ingredient7: 4 tbsp Greek extra virgin olive oil

Name: Tuna, asparagus salad
Preparation: Cook the asparagus, drain, cool, cut into finger-length pieces. Toss together the tuna, beans, onion, capers and asparagus  add cutted the potatoes, shallots, capers and cornichons, if using. Add mayonnaise mix .
Ingredient2: 2 x cans tuna steaks in water, drained
Ingredient3: 2 x cans cannellini beans in water, drained

Name: Classic potato salad
Preparation: Boil the potatoes in salted water for 20 mins until just cooked, drain, then cool, potatoes, shallots, capers and cornichons. Add  mayonnaise and Mix all ingredients.
Ingredient8: small handful parsley leaves, roughly chopped
